DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare 5-year survival clinical behavior single posterior ceramic crown make pressable ceramic zirconia metal framework . If failure occur , aim study delineate factor contribute failure . The null hypothesis state survival zirconia-based restoration would worse make metal-based material .
DOC.brief_title: Zirconia Metal-based Single Crown Posterior Restorations .
DOC.criteria: Informed Consent document signature Male female patient 1870 year age Need single crown restoration Presence antagonist minimum 20 teeth moderate good oral hygiene ability perform mechanical oral hygiene technique include tooth brush low moderate caries risk , active periodontal disease . Women pregnant date inclusion Known suspect noncompliance , drug alcohol abuse Inability follow procedure study , e.g . due language problem , psychological disorder , dementia , etc . participant Smoking 15 cigarette day Poor oral hygiene ( Plaque Index 30 % ) Bruxism vital teeth allergic reaction hypersensitivity ingredient adhesive restorative material
